name: Bratwurst Mince
description: A savory and aromatic German-style bratwurst mince, crafted from fatty pork and a classic blend of spices including mace, marjoram, and caraway. This versatile mix is perfect for creating homemade sausage patties, fillings for pastries, or as a flavorful base for various hearty dishes.

recipeInstructions.text: In a hot pan, fry in a bit of oil until cooked through.

notes: While depicted with sauerkraut and sour cream, this is really just a guide recipe for getting that bratwurst flavor for a mince mix so it can be used in something, like an oktoberfest strudle!
Need a fatty mince so it doesn't dry out.
